author: jeremias
msg: After chasing a phantom for hours, it looks like it's simply the big images being generated that eat over 90% of the memory and at some point cause an OutOfMemoryError. Releasing the bitmaps a little sooner now which helps a little. "-Xmx256m" is still a good idea for BatchDiffer.
Haven't found any memory leaks inside FOP, since I fixed the image cache.

author: thorsten
msg: Limited support for cforms. Right now it is *not* possible to add custom flow snippets this will have to change in the future.
